name: Downlift
description:
You find yourself in a room with an elevator. You can't leave. It seems like your only option is getting inside and hoping it will take you closer to the exit. Will you be able to escape?

Made in a few days using Godot Engine, see credits inside the game for the full list of assets used.

There should always be a path to the ending, but I had problems with that during testing. Tell me if you find any bugs!
